/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/21.3/compilers/bin/nvc++ -std=c++14 -DNDEBUG -O3 -march=native CMakeFiles/microhh.dir/microhh.cxx.o -o ../microhh   -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/21.3/cuda/11.2/lib64  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/21.3/math_libs/11.2/lib64  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/21.3/comm_libs/11.2/nccl/lib  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/21.3/comm_libs/11.2/nvshmem/lib  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/21.3/cuda/11.2/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/21.3/cuda/11.2/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  ../src/libmicrohhc.a ../rte-rrtmgp-cpp/src/librte_rrtmgp.a ../rte-rrtmgp-cpp/src_cuda/librte_rrtmgp_cuda.a ../rte-rrtmgp-cpp/src_kernels/librte_rrtmgp_kernels.a ../rte-rrtmgp-cpp/src_kernels_cuda/librte_rrtmgp_kernels_cuda.a -rdynamic /opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64//21.3/math_libs/lib64/libcufft.so -lfftw3 -lfftw3f -lnetcdf_c++4 -lnetcdf -lhdf5_serial_hl -lhdf5_serial -lm -lz -lcurl -lm -lz -lcurl -lnvf -lrt -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt
